GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
ACT
No. 13 of 1994
Date of Assent: 11th May, 1994
An Act to provide for the amounts of fees and fines to be
expressed in terms of fee units and penalty units; to provide
for the amounts of existing fees and fines to be converted into
fee units and penalty units; and to provide for matters
connected with or incidental to the foregoing.
[3rd June, 1994
